title: My Husband Follows 900 Models
itunes:title: My Husband Follows 900 Models
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been together 28 years and we’ve been married for 17. We have a 19 year old son together and my son recently got his father hooked on Instagram. Before my husband got on social media, we watched movies as a family, we’d go walking in the evening and even fool around in the morning. Now when he wakes up, he’d rather look at pictures of topless women or women in swimsuits or in thongs..............................................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
